pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partitioning the Drivers of Stability of Ecological Communities // Contains the basic functions to apply the unified framework for partitioning the drivers of stability of ecological communities. J. Segrestin, L. Gtzenberger, E. Valencia, F. de Bello J. Lep (2024) "A unified framework for partitioning the drivers of stability of ecological communities" minor revisions.
